description: Create a project revenue item quantity estimate.
permissions: Allowed for users who can create the related project revenue item: admin users or manager members of the broker for the related project revenue item (delegated via ProjectRevenueItemQuantityEstimatePolicy -> ProjectRevenueItemPolicy).
side_effects: Creates a project revenue item quantity estimate.
validation_notes: --project-revenue-item and --project-estimate-set are required and must be non-empty. If --estimate is provided, it must be valid JSON; it must be a JSON object or JSON null. Estimate payloads should include class_name and distribution parameters (examples: NormalDistribution {class_name, mean, standard_deviation}; TriangularDistribution {class_name, minimum, mode, maximum}).

flags.name: --estimate
flags.validation: Must be valid JSON; must be a JSON object or JSON null.
